unnormalised: Are your Instagram reels reaching the right audience in Mumbai? Struggling to understand why that Diwali campaign only got 200 likes? It's time to dive deep into Follower Analytics!
normalised: Are your Instagram reels reaching the right audience in Mumbai? Struggling to understand why that Diwali campaign only got two hundred likes? It's time to dive deep into Follower Analytics!

unnormalised: Experts at IIM Bangalore are now offering short courses starting 10/11/2023 to help influencers and businesses in the social media game. Forget just counting followers – we're talking serious data. Demographics, engagement patterns, peak activity times (think when folks in Delhi are scrolling during their chai break around 16:00 hrs), and even the effectiveness of your sponsored posts featuring jalebi recipes!
normalised: Experts at I I M Bangalore are now offering short courses starting tenth november two thousand and twenty three to help influencers and businesses in the social media game. Forget just counting followers – we're talking serious data. Demographics, engagement patterns, peak activity times (think when folks in Delhi are scrolling during their chai break around sixteen hundred hours), and even the effectiveness of your sponsored posts featuring jalebi recipes!

unnormalised: Knowing your audience's preferences is crucial. Analytics can reveal if they're more interested in saree styling tips from Chennai or investment advice relevant to the Indian market. Stop wasting money on generic campaigns! Imagine targeting that perfectly timed post on travel deals for Goa at precisely 07:00 hrs on a Sunday morning, 22/10/2023. That’s the power of data, beta! Learn how to use follower analytics to boost your engagement and ROI. Think of it as your personal astrologer, but for your brand.
